dialogue.htmlContent:
Not able to bring yourself to betray Meraxis, and by extension Ursa, Minotallys, Lyssieth, and everyone else who's counting on you to play a major role in defeating Lunette, you tell the [meraxis.race] that while interrogating her, Lunexis managed to seduce you, and that you were on the verge of carrying out her plans.

[meraxis.speech(Wait, what?!)] Meraxis cries with a look of absolute shock on her face. Shaking her head a little, she momentarily drops her chuuni act as she asks, [meraxis.speech(What did that bitch tell you to do?! I'll teach her a lesson!)]

Realising that Meraxis will find out about the details of your Mistress's plan one way or another, you tell her what Lunexis's orders were.

[meraxis.speech(So she sent you here to trick me into setting her free? That bitch...)] Meraxis sighs, before placing her hands on her hips and declaring in her typical chuuni way, [meraxis.speech(I cannot possibly imagine what foul, dark arts that demon used to force you to submit to her! Thankfully our fates have been intertwined strongly enough to have ensured that you wouldn't betray me. The queen of the Amazons herself needs to be informed of Lunexis's evil powers, otherwise her subjects could be seduced and enslaved to that demon's will. So join me, [pc.name]; we're going to their camp!)]

Having committed to betraying Lunexis, you do as Meraxis says and join her as she leads the way through Elis, out of the western gate, and to the entrance of the Amazons' camp. The sentinels on duty recognise the two of you, and so the [meraxis.race] is able to confidently stride right past them, and with you at her side, is soon standing before Ursa's tent.

[style.speechFeminineStrong(Meraxis. What brings you back here?)] one of the bear-girl guards asks, revealing that Meraxis has already paid Ursa a visit at some point.

[meraxis.speech(I require an audience with your queen!)] your companion declares, before striking a wild pose and warning, [meraxis.speech(The very fate of your people depends on Ursa receiving the information I hold!)]

Nodding her head, the larger of the two bear-girl guards gestures for you and Meraxis to go on in. A moment later, and you and the [meraxis.race] are standing in the middle of the queen's tent. Looking back and forth between the two of you from the other side of the table which sits in the centre of the tent, Ursa crosses her arms and asks, [ursa.speech(Well, what is it? Speak quickly, for I have many matters to attend to.)]

Not wasting any time, Meraxis recounts what you revealed to her in her typical, exaggerated manner of speaking. Upon hearing that you'd submitted to Lunexis and been ordered to help set her free, Ursa shoots you a severe glare, but as Meraxis finally finishes recounting your tale, the queen lets out a deep, relieved sigh and states, [ursa.speech(It seems as though I've underestimated our prisoner. I should have known that a recognised daughter of an elder lilin was capable of something like this... Well, in any case, at least you pulled through in the end, [pc.name], and didn't betray us. I think we'll all agree that it would be wise not to let you see Lunexis again; who knows what she could make you do if you were subjected to any more of her charms.)]

[meraxis.speech(I agree,)] Meraxis chimes in, [meraxis.speech(Whatever foul power that demon has been able to exert over [pc.name] must not be allowed to be harnessed!)]

Nodding in agreement, Ursa looks over at you and states in her deep voice, [ursa.speech(I don't hold anything against you, [pc.name]; there's no shame in being bested by a demon of that power. Now, with that all settled, I think this would be a good opportunity to give you your reward for assisting me in Themiscyra, Meraxis. You departed so quickly the last time you were here that I wasn't able to show you my deep appreciation...)]

Noticing the hungry look in the bear-girl's eyes, Meraxis seems to quickly understand what exactly this reward entails. Obviously not wanting to be dominantly fucked by the Amazonian queen, she quickly blurts out, [meraxis.speech(Oh! A thousand apologies, but I just remembered! Erm... I left my minions unattended! I need to get back to them! Fare well!)]

Not giving the queen any time to respond, Meraxis disappears in a flash of pink light as she casts teleport. Letting out an amused growl, Ursa looks over to you and says, [ursa.speech(I didn't really have time for it right now anyway... I suppose you'd better be on your way as well, [pc.name]. Come back tomorrow if you want to see me again; I'll be busy for the rest of the day.)]

Doing as the queen suggests, you quickly say goodbye and exit her tent. As you [pc.step] back out into the Amazons' camp, you reflect on the miraculous fact that Ursa and Meraxis didn't seem to think any less of you after learning of your submission to Lunexis. Thankfully, they seemed more impressed by your honesty than concerned at your initial betrayal, and so you breathe a sigh of relief as you realise that your relations with the two of them aren't going to suffer from this episode.

Turing your thoughts back to Lunexis, you can't help but let out a disappointed sigh as you realise that you're not going to be able to get another taste of her cock. Hoping that you'll find another Mistress like her at some point in the future, you continue on your way into the camp and wonder what to do next...

Thinking of how your Mistress will reward you by turning you into her cock-sleeve, you decide to commit to carrying out her orders and try to trick Meraxis into helping you set her free. Knowing the sort of thing that the [meraxis.race] would be interested in, you tell Meraxis that during your interrogation of Lunexis, she revealed to you that the reason for their assault on Themiscyra was to find a secret weapon, said to have been created by Lilith herself. With the defeat of their leader, and not knowing the real reason why they were led there, Lunexis's army will have scattered and abandoned Themiscyra, allowing you to go there and claim this weapon for yourself.

[meraxis.speech(So that's why they risked attacking Themiscyra...)] Meraxis responds, clearly believing your every word. Striking a confident pose, she states in her typical, flamboyant manner, [meraxis.speech(We shall journey to Themiscyra, uncover this weapon, and unleash its cataclysmic powers in order to defeat Lunette! Simply lead the way, [pc.name], and soon this artefact shall be ours!)]

Continuing with your fabricated tale, you tell Meraxis that Lunexis's directions are too vague, and as such you'll be unable to pinpoint the exact location where the weapon is hidden. As such, you'll need to take the centauress along with you so that she can lead the way to the weapon.

[meraxis.speech(Take Lunexis with us?)] Meraxis asks, clearly startled by your suggestion. Furrowing her brow, she continues, [meraxis.speech(I'm sure that our powers combined would be more than enough to keep her subdued, but it still sounds risky. Has Ursa been informed of all this?)]

Telling Meraxis that the Amazon queen has enough to deal with as it is, you say that you won't need her help, and that what's needed is decisive action before some looter or bandit discovers the weapon before you.

[meraxis.speech(I'm not so sure about this,)] Meraxis says, before stating, [meraxis.speech(I'll speak with Lunexis myself. Once I hear what that demon's talking about I'll make a decision. Come on, [pc.name], let's get going!)]

Having committed to loyally serving your Mistress, you do as Meraxis says and join her as she leads the way through Elis, out of the western gate, and to the entrance of the Amazons' camp. The sentinels on duty recognise the two of you, and so the [meraxis.race] is able to confidently stride right past them, and with you at her side, is soon standing before Ursa's tent.

[style.speechFeminineStrong(Meraxis. What brings you back here?)] one of the bear-girl guards asks, revealing that Meraxis has already paid Ursa a visit at some point. Looking back and forth between the two of you, she reveals, [style.speechFeminineStrong(Our queen is in the middle of a critically important meeting, and cannot be disturbed for any reason.)]

This revelation lends credence to your assertion that Ursa is too busy to get involved in the matter of retrieving a secret weapon, and you utter silent thanks to the queen for choosing this moment in which to hold her meeting. Not deterred by the guard's statement, Meraxis declares in an uncharacteristically-hushed tone, [meraxis.speech(It's not your queen that we're here to see. Let us through, for we need to speak with the prisoner.)]

Nodding in understanding, one of the two bear-girl guards motions for you to follow her, and so you and Meraxis trail along behind her as she enters the queen's tent. Once inside, you see that almost two dozen Amazons are crowded around the tent's central table, noisily discussing plans on how to recapture their town. Thanks to this commotion, you're able to skirt around the edge of the tent and exit out of the far side without being noticed. Once again finding yourself in the small, walled compound, you and Meraxis leave the bear-girl guard behind as you head straight on over to the large, pale-red tent which is positioned in the centre of this grassy area.

As you open the entrance flap and [pc.step] into the sound-proof tent, you notice a flash of delight in Lunexis's eyes as she sees that Meraxis is with you. Thankfully, the centauress quickly gets control of herself and takes on the part of the indignant demon as the two of you move forwards to stand before her. With a furious scowl on her face, she spits, [lunexis.speech(What the fuck do you two cunts want?! Set me free, you vile wretches, and I might consider taking you as my personal cock-sleeves!)]

Feeling your heart pounding in excitement as your Mistress says this, you try to keep your cool as you state that you're here about the secret weapon she mentioned before. Although possessing herculean strength and an unbreakable will, Lunexis isn't known for her intellectual prowess, and so when she hears your talk of a secret weapon, she blurts out, [lunexis.speech(What the fuck are you talking about, slave?! Set me free!)]

With your plan teetering on the brink of failure, you glare at Lunexis and pointedly 'remind her' of what she told you; there's a secret weapon hidden in Themiscyra, and she's the only one who knows exactly where it is. Finally understanding what's going on, the brutish centauress grins and declares, [lunexis.speech(Forget about that, you dumb cunt! I'll never let you have it! That weapon is mine!)]

Thankfully, in her excitement at the prospect of obtaining a powerful relic, Meraxis hasn't noticed Lunexis's odd behaviour, and after pointing an accusatory finger at the centauress, she demands, [meraxis.speech(Tell us what you know, you evil beast! That weapon shall be ours!)]

[lunexis.speech(The only thing that's going to be yours is my fat cock as I ram it into your cunt!)] the centauress bellows.

[meraxis.speech(Uncooperative as ever, I see,)] Meraxis states, before grinning and saying, [meraxis.speech(Well, we don't need you to tell us where it is. We'll be making you show it to us in just a moment...)]

With that, the [meraxis.race] turns to you and asks, [meraxis.speech(Are you certain that it's safe to teleport to Themiscyra? I haven't heard anything about the movements of Lunexis's army...)]

Reassuring Meraxis by telling her that you've checked it out and that it's safe, you try to make your lie a little more believable by warning her that there might be the occasional bandit. Not wanting to give the [meraxis.race] any time in which to stop and think, you say that you want to get this over and done with as quickly as possible, and to avoid as much travel as you can, she should teleport the three of you straight to the town's plaza.

[meraxis.speech(Ok, let's do this,)] Meraxis states, before turning to Lunexis and warning her, [meraxis.speech(Try to run away or attack us, and you'll regret it! You lost once to us already, and this time you don't even have your weapons, so you stand no chance against us. Do as I say, and I won't have to hurt you.)]

With that, Meraxis begins to channel her energy, and by sacrificing a large amount of the essences she's absorbed into her aura, she manages to remove the seal that's been placed on Lunexis's collar. Realising that she's about to get her revenge, a devious smirk settles on Lunexis's face as she impatiently unclasps the metal collar from around her neck and hurls it to the ground. Fixing her gaze on Meraxis's face, she sneers, [lunexis.speech(Don't worry, bitch, you have my word that I won't leave you.)]

[meraxis.speech(You'd better not,)] Meraxis replies, before summoning her energy and beginning to cast the teleportation spell. The last thing you see before a flash of pinkish purple light envelops you is a wild, triumphant grin on your Mistress's face...

An instant later, and the three of you find yourselves standing back in the middle of Themiscyra's plaza. Just as Lunexis had hoped, her army is still here, and as the purple flash dies away, you glance around to see that hundreds of demonic centaurs are looking your way. Stepping forwards, Lunexis roughly grabs hold of you, before rearing up and pointing at Meraxis as she booms, [lunexis.speech(Get her before she can escape!)]

Letting out a triumphant laugh, your Mistress watches as her army rushes forwards to attack Meraxis. Possessing considerable arcane and combat skills, the [meraxis.race] manages to floor the first centauresses who reach her, and as Lunexis realises that this fight might take a while, she barks out an order to a nearby centauress, [lunexis.speech(Bring me my clothes and weapons, you worthless scum! Oh, and bring a collar for my slave, too!)]
